AT.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
AT.description: Pokémon Rumble U erzählt die Geschichte des bisher größten Abenteuers der Pokémon-Spielfiguren: Nach einem unglücklichen Zwischenfall im Spielzeugladen landen ein paar Pokémon-Kapseln kurzerhand in einem Fluss und die Pokémon-Spielfiguren darin stranden an einem fremden Ufer. Unsere Helden ziehen los, um den Weg zurück zum Spielzeugladen zu finden. Doch die Reise erweist sich als schwieriger als erwartet… Wirst du herausfinden, was der Grund für den Zwist zwischen den Pokémon-Spielfiguren ist und wer oder was hinter dem Ganzen steckt?

AU.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
AU.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Along the way our heroes discover all is not right: Can you help our friends discover why some of the Toy Pokémon are fighting each other, and what the enemy Pokémon are plotting?

BG.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
BG.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Along the way our heroes discover all is not right: Can you help our friends discover why some of the Toy Pokémon are fighting each other, and what the enemy Pokémon are plotting?

BE.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
BE.description: Pokémon Rumble U raconte l’histoire de Jouets Pokémon lancés dans une grande aventure : après un incident dans un Magasin Pokémon, plusieurs capsules Pokémon sont emportées dans une rivière et échouent sur une étrange berge. Nos héros décident de rentrer à la boutique par leurs propres moyens, mais ils découvriront en chemin que quelque chose ne tourne pas rond… Pourrez-vous aider nos amis à comprendre pourquoi certains Jouets Pokémon se battent entre eux, et ce que leurs ennemis trament dans l’ombre ?

CA.name: Pokémon Rumble U
CA.description: Toy Pokémon are popular items that fly off the shelves at the Toy Shop. One day, some capsules filled with Toy Pokémon accidentally drops into the river - a river that sets them adrift to a far-off place. The Toy Pokémon start a journey that they hope will lead them back to the Toy Shop. But blocking their way stands their fellow Toy Pokémon! Battle your way through the enemies surrounding you and experience an epic adventure! The world of Pokémon Rumble U is split into several Areas with fearsome Bosses. Get ready to take on multiple battle stages as you progress through each Area - you'll have to be victorious in each one to continue forward. Collect Pokémon Rumble U NFC Figures to help you on your journey. NFC Figures can be scanned to receive that Toy Pokémon in-game and powered-up using money gathered in the game to use their special traits in battle.

Unsere Helden ziehen los, um den Weg zurück zum Spielzeugladen zu finden. ES.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
ES.description: Pokémon Rumble U relata la historia de la gran aventura de unos Juguetes Pokémon: tras un percance en la Juguetería Pokémon, algunas cápsulas Pokémon se van río abajo con la corriente y acaban en una ribera de lo más peculiar. Nuestros héroes emprenderán entonces el camino de regreso a la Juguetería Pokémon, pero, a lo largo del camino, se darán cuenta de que las cosas no andan bien. ¿Podrás ayudar a nuestros amigos a descubrir por qué los Juguetes Pokémon están enfrentados entre sí y qué es lo que traman los Pokémon enemigos?

FI.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Nos héros décident de rentrer à la boutique par leurs propres moyens, mais ils découvriront en chemin que quelque chose ne tourne pas rond… Pourrez-vous aider nos amis à comprendre pourquoi certains Jouets Pokémon se battent entre eux, et ce que leurs ennemis trament dans l’ombre ?

IT.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
IT.description: Pokémon Rumble U è la storia della grande avventura dei Pokémon giocattolo: per un maldestro incidente al Negozio Pokémon, alcune capsule contenenti dei Pokémon giocattolo finiscono nel fiume e vengono trasportate su una strana riva. I nostri eroi si mettono in cammino per fare ritorno al loro negozio. Ma lungo la strada si accorgeranno presto che c’è qualcosa che non va. Puoi aiutare i nostri amici a scoprire perché alcuni Pokémon giocattolo lottano fra loro e cosa stanno complottando i Pokémon nemici?

LT.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
LT.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Nos héros décident de rentrer à la boutique par leurs propres moyens, mais ils découvriront en chemin que quelque chose ne tourne pas rond… Pourrez-vous aider nos amis à comprendre pourquoi certains Jouets Pokémon se battent entre eux, et ce que leurs ennemis trament dans l’ombre ?

MT.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
MT.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Along the way our heroes discover all is not right: Can you help our friends discover why some of the Toy Pokémon are fighting each other, and what the enemy Pokémon are plotting?

MX.name: Pokémon Rumble U
MX.description: Los Juguetes Pokémon son objetos populares que se venden rápidamente en la Juguetería Pokémon. Cuando unas cápsulas que contienen Juguetes Pokémon caen a un río por accidente, este río los lleva a un lejano lugar. Los Juguetes Pokémon deciden emprender un viaje de regreso a la Juguetería Pokémon pero otros Juguetes Pokémon les harán difícil el viaje. ¡Ábrete camino combatiendo a los enemigos que encuentres en tu paso y experimenta una épica aventura! El mundo de Pokémon Rumble U está dividido en diferentes zonas con temibles jefes. Prepárate para enfrentarte en numerosas batallas mientras progresas a través de cada zona y recuerda que tendrás que salir victorioso en cada zona para poder continuar con tu aventura. Reúne figuras NFC de Pokémon Rumble U para usarlas durante tu aventura. Puedes escanear las figuras NFC para recibir Juguetes Pokémon en el juego y utilizar el dinero que has recolectado durante la partida para subir de nivel y utilizar los sobrenombres durante la batalla.

NO.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
NO.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Along the way our heroes discover all is not right: Can you help our friends discover why some of the Toy Pokémon are fighting each other, and what the enemy Pokémon are plotting?

NL.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
NL.description: Pokémon Rumble U vertelt het verhaal van het grote avontuur van de Toy Pokémon. Na een ongelukje in de Toy Pokémon Shop drijven enkele Pokémon Capsules een rivier af en spoelen uiteindelijk aan op een vreemde oever. Onze helden beginnen vervolgens aan een lange terugweg naar de Toy Pokémon Shop. Onderweg komen ze erachter dat het niet allemaal rozengeur en maneschijn is. Kun jij onze vrienden helpen ontdekken waarom sommige Toy Pokémon met elkaar vechten en wat de vijandige Pokémon in hun schild voeren?

NZ.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
NZ.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Along the way our heroes discover all is not right: Can you help our friends discover why some of the Toy Pokémon are fighting each other, and what the enemy Pokémon are plotting?

PL.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
PL.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank. Our heroes set out to find their way back to the Toy Pokémon Shop. Along the way our heroes discover all is not right: Can you help our friends discover why some of the Toy Pokémon are fighting each other, and what the enemy Pokémon are plotting?

PT.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
PT.description: Pokémon Rumble U conta a história da maior aventura dos Toy Pokémon: depois de um acidente na Loja Toy Pokémon, algumas Cápsulas Pokémon são levadas pela corrente do rio e vão parar a uma margem estranha. Os nossos heróis partem à descoberta do caminho de volta para a Loja Toy Pokémon. Durante o caminho, os nossos heróis percebem que se passa algo de errado. Consegue ajudar os nossos amigos a descobrir por que motivo os Toy Pokémon lutam uns contra os outros e o que é que os Pokémon inimigos andam a conspirar?

RU.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
RU.description: Отправляйтесь навстречу захватывающим приключениям вместе с Toy Pokémon в игре Pokémon Rumble U. Однажды в магазине Toy Pokémon Shop случилось несчастье: несколько капсул с покемонами упали в реку, и их выбросило на берег в весьма странном месте. Наши герои должны во что бы то ни стало вернуться в родной магазин. Однако с самого начала их путешествие не задалось. Вот они и ломают голову, почему некоторые покемоны задираются со своими товарищами и что замышляют вражеские покемоны?

SE.name: Pokémon™ Rumble U
SE.description: Pokémon Rumble U is the tale of the Toy Pokémon’s great adventure: after a mishap in the Toy Pokémon Shop, a few Pokémon capsules are swept down a river and washed up on a strange riverbank.
